pages.text: You have collected Black Granite, and now you can craft $(item)Basic Energy Pipes,$() a $(item)Crankmill,$() and an $(item)Electric Purifier. The Crankmill will generate power from kinetic energy from a Gearbox.$()$(p)$(l:blocks/pipes)Follow this link for more information on Pipes.$(/l)

Providing the Gearbox is receiving power and everything is wired up correctly, the Electric Purifier will now be receiving power! Great!$(p)The Purifier can simplify the process of getting Pure Ingots. By putting Sand and Gravel in the machine with an Ingot, it will output a Pure Ingot.$(p)This process is required to get our next item: $(item)Pure Steel.
Now that we have Steel Plates, crafted as you would expect, we can make a series of machines, including the $(item)Alloy Smelter.$(p)$() For information on the other machines, check the Blocks tab.

pages.title: Crafting Components
pages.text: $(item)Energized Gold Ingot$() is obtained by combining Redstone Dust and Gold Plate in Alloy Smelter. Plates can be made in the way you would expect.

The Alloy Smelter can make Steel without Lava. You can also get $(5)$(l)Mystium Ingots.$() The tree is as follows:$(li)Combine Ground Lapis Lazuli and Redstone Dust in Mixer with Lava to get $(5)Mystium Blend.$()$(li)Combine Ground Netherite and Energized Gold in Alloy Smelter to get Electrified Netherite Blend.$(li)Combine Mystium Blend and Electrified Netherite Blend in Alloy Smelter to get $(item)Mystium Ingot.

Now that we have Mystium, we can make a neat tool: The $(item)Mystium Dowsing Rod.$()$(p)This handy tool will help you find $(l)Oil$() in the Overworld. You will also need to go to The End to find Chromium Ore.
$(o)$(7)Mystium and Chromium Plates can be made in the same way you'd expect.$()$(p)After this, you should be left with the Dowsing Rod, the Pump, and the Pumpshaft.

When using the Rod in a chunk, the Rod will let you know how what fluid, if any, is present. You can find Water, Lava, Oil, or even more fluids!$(p)Oil is found in the Overworld, somewhat rarely. Once found, set up the Pump anywhere in the chunk, as shown to the right, supply power, and watch the Oil generate until the chunk is empty.$(p)$(7)$(o)TIP: Tanks can be broken and will maintain contents!

pages.name: Pump
pages.text: $(7)$(o)Try Dowsing in the Nether and End too!

Next, we will begin the biggest hurdle for processing so far: The $(item)Refinery.$() This multiblock will take fluids and items, process them based on the attachment, and give back a fluid or item. $(p)I advise researching power generation options in Blocks section.$(p)For this tree, you will also need $(item)Stainless Steel Plates,$() by combining Chromium Plate and Steel Plate in Alloy Smelter.

pages.title: Gas Upgrade
pages.text: This upgrade is REQUIRED for all Refineries that accept Gas as an input. They are not necessary for those which output it.

Your needs will vary, but for Plastic and Rubber processing, you will likely need the following to work most effectively:$(li)5 Refineries.$(li)1 Halogen Reactor Attachment.$(li)2 Cracking Chamber Attachments.$(li)2 Addition Attachments.$(li)4 Gas Processing Upgrades.$(li)1 Fluid Router.$(li)Lots of Pipes.$(li)Lots of power.

Great! Really great. The Refinery can be fed ingredients and power on all sides, same with extracting the results. The Attachments need to be placed on the Refinery to operate. The following pages will outline how to get Plastic and Rubber.

One of two components of Oil.$(li)Break down Oil into $(item)Propane$() from the Halogen Reactor Refinery.$(li)Crack Propane into $(item)Propylene$() with the Cracking Chamber Refinery.$(li)Combine Propylene with Ground Charcoal in the Addition Refinery.

One of two components of Oil.$(li)Break down Oil into $(item)Ethane$() from the Halogen Reactor Refinery.$(li)Crack Ethane into $(item)Ethylene$() with the Cracking Chamber Refinery.$(li)Combine Ethylene with Ground Charcoal in the Addition Refinery.
Plastic and Rubber Balls can be shapped into $(item)Plastic and Rubber Sheets$() using the Pneumatic Compressor.$(p)As always, you can also use a Hammer.
Now that you have Plastic and Rubber, your long time in the Electrical Era draws to a close, and thus begins your exploration into the $(l:age4)Synthetic Age.
